about.title: Software Engineer
about.description: Hi! I am a software engineer focused on web development, passionate about transforming ideas into impactful digital experiences...

project1.title: Landing Page
project1.description: This independent project is a landing page for a fast food store.

project2.title: Color palette

project3.title: Wonders of the World

project4.title: Tic-tac-toe
project4.description: This project is based on the traditional tic-tac-toe mobile game, but with a Spider-Man theme.
